Get minimum degrees of freedom for Inverted Wishart

get_minimum_nw_IW.Rd

Returns minimum value for degrees of freedom such that the Inverted Wishart has a well-defined expected value.

get_minimum_nw_IW(p)

Arguments

p

number of variables

Value

minimum dof \(\nu_w\)

Details

Uses (Press 2012) parametrization.

$$X \sim IW(\nu, S)$$

with \(S = pxp\) matrix, \(n_w > 2p\) (the degrees of freedom).

Then:

$$E[X] = S / (\nu_w - 2(p + 1))$$

Finally, the minimum dof \(\nu_w\) are: \(\nu_w = 2(p + 1) + 1\).

References

Press SJ (2012). Applied Multivariate Analysis: Using Bayesian and Frequentist Methods of Inference. Courier Corporation.

See also

Other core functions: bayessource-package, make_priors_and_init(), marginalLikelihood_internal(), marginalLikelihood(), mcmc_postproc(), samesource_C(), two.level.multivariate.calculate.UC()

Other Wishart functions: diwishart_inverse_R(), diwishart_inverse(), diwishart(), dwishart(), riwish_Press(), rwish()
